column5: Going camping in Durham this weekend. Thinking of hitting Eugenia Sat or Sun, or both...lol. Anyone got any info on public access, species of fish, and are motors allowed?  Thanks
Bass and Trout. Thats pretty much it. Bass are closed until the 4th Saturday in June, trout there are best fished from shore anyways
Try for some trout then I suppose.

Eugenia Trout will be feeding HEAVILY on insects this time of year. Were ever the Wind is comming from...work the other side as thats were the largest concentrations will be. If your lucky you'll get some sun, and a flashy lure might get 'em going....wabbler, mepps  Good luck.
I've done well from shore by the dam, which is accessable
I assume you can use live bait there?
Thanks Steve. How deep is the lake? I just have a 12' car topper is there anywhere I can just throw it in and go park somewhere?
Launch is NW corner of lake.
There are also lots of carp up to about 12 lbs, and big rock bass.
Just found out today that my buddy at work has a cottage on Eugenia and he'll be up there on the weekend. I can launch from his place. Are rock bass under same reg's and season as regular bass?

there are lots of big rock bass also alot of perch I fished the lake 2 days ago and lately i have been seeing alot of carp rise to the surface in the morning. Largemouth and Smallmouth bass can also get pretty big in Eugenia lake I cought a 22" smallmouth the other day. By the dam you can find a good amount of rainbow trout down deep good luck!
